div.p:
Smothers Academy is designed to develop male students
into competent, self-motivated, lifelong learners.
Our goal is to provide a student-centered environment in
which all students are held to high academic and behavioral
standards. Our foundational principles of "obedience and
discipline" reflect our commitment to the fundamental pillars
of learning.
